body:
Comment 4: 
Thanks Peter, that was helpful. It seems that auto-removal of temporary files can't 
be reliably done with finalizers. 

This is an outline of a solution from the paper:  add a table of temp files to the 
runtime, and a cleanup() method that removes them. The cleanup method would have to 
run before the program exits. 

A more generic version of this would be to have some variant of finalizers that are 
guaranteed to run before the program exits.
